Asmir Begovic has slammed Liverpool's back-line by saying their players lack the pride and desire it takes to be defenders. (@MailSport)

Begovic: "They are not doing the basics of defending and I don't think they have the pride it takes to be a defender."

Begovic: "I look at some of their players and the first thing is how good they can be on the ball, how they can pass and go forward."

Jurgen Klopp got his Liverpool squad together on Monday for a lengthy inquest into the 4-1 mauling at the hands of Tottenham. (James Pearce)

Jordan Henderson and his team-mates had to relive a shambolic defensive display as Klopp went through the video analysis. (James Pearce)

Each of Spurs’ goals were examined in detail. It was an open & honest exchange with players contributing to the conversation. (James Pearce)

Klopp was more angry with how Liverpool defended as a unit, not just down to individual errors but a lack of organisation. (James Pearce)

Satisfied with what he heard on Monday, Klopp gave his players Tuesday off rather than punish them with an extra session. (James Pearce)
